title: Forest under siege
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Desmond Dew and Colin Low
brief_description: Two million six hundred square kilometres of forest are the feeding-grounds of armies of insects. This film shows the devastation, its causes, and the many ways in which the Canadian Forestry Service, with the help of the provincial governments, is fighting this vast attack.
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Desmond Dew and Colin Low
